title: RHOSLC The Unravelling At Zion + And Just Like That
itunes:title: RHOSLC The Unravelling At Zion + And Just Like That
description:
Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured the further unravelling of this cast of women at Zion. Meredith threatens to quit, then somehow, maybe makes up with Jennifer Shah? The women also do some outdoor activities, and channel their inner-RHONY by creating Club Zion, plus Danny touches on RHOM. After RHOSLC, Danny dives in to this week's And Just Like That, which involves Cleveland and a rally?


And Just Like That Recap: 37:25ish
